posts.post_content:
These are all on eBay as auctions with no bids yet.  While there is no bid, I will sell at the prices below.  Prices reduced $5-10 per card.  Price includes delivery; paypal preferred. 

[URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers#100233"]Check out front and back scans here.[/URL] There is an option to download each scan which will give you a larger view. 
I also have [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=151044"]SGC 30s[/URL] and [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=151068"]SGC 40s[/URL] for sale.
